sentences.sContent: Out of the 200 roles that were applied for, the submissions which were accompanied by a low-cut dress received 62 more interview offers than their more conservatively dressed counterparts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Out of the 200 roles that were applied for, the submissions which were accompanied by a low-cut dress received 62 more interview offers than their more conservatively dressed counterparts.
sentences.sCn: 最终提交的结果显示，在总共申请的200个职位中，相比于衣着保守的那名女性来说，穿低胸装的那名女性多得到了62个面试机会。

sentences.sContent: Out tof the 200 roles that were applied for, the submissions which were accompanied by a low-cut dress received 62 more interview offers than their more conservatively dressed counterparts.

sentences.sCn: 最终提交的结果显示，在总共申请的200个职位中，相比于衣着保守的那名女性来说，穿低胸装的那名女性多得到了62个面试机会。

words.tran: 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒
